comments:
I've got pre-existing java code which I'm trying to turn into an eclipse
project. When eclipse reads the code, I get a dialog box saying there was an
internal error. The error log is below.

All my other projects imported correctly. Unfortunately, I can't include the
source code I'm trying to import, but the names of the classes are
CondDispatchable, CondEventDispatchable, Dispatchable, DispatchableImpl,
EventDispatcher, Status, TIBDispatchable, TIBEventDispatcher, and TimerEvent,
and they're in package com.citadel.gat.eventloop.

I've tried everything I can to get it to import the code, but it won't. I even
removed eclipse and reinstalled, and deleted all the .project files in the
source directory.
